data.name: Gladiator
data.description: Superguardian of the Shi'ar Imperium, Gladiator uses his near limitless might and superhuman feats to protect his allies and the universe from the worst of the worst.

starItems.name: Gladiator
starItems.description: Superguardian of the Shi'ar Imperium, Gladiator uses his near limitless might and superhuman feats to protect his allies and the universe from the worst of the worst.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.

1.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies

2.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

3.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
Flip all negative effects on self and <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies

6.description:
Flip all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all positive effects on all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.

Flip all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage.
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, clear all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

2.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

3.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Barrier self for +<color=#86e619>15%</color>, if below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance

5.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Healing for self and <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns each

6.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
If below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, reduce Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>50%</color>

7.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Gain Barrier for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more:
 > Reduce Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

On any Turn, If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, while this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, enemies cannot fill or reduce Speed Bar for themselves, allies, or enemies

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

On any Turn, If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > While this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, enemies cannot fill or reduce Speed Bar for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
2.nextUpgrade: If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies, while this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, this character and all allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> or <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

On any Turn, If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies, while this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, this character and all allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> or <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > While this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, enemies cannot fill or reduce Speed Bar for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
3.nextUpgrade: When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

On any Turn, If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies, while this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, this character and all allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> or <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > While this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, enemies cannot fill or reduce Speed Bar for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.

On any Turn, If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies, while this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, this character and all allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> or <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > While this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or more, enemies cannot fill or reduce Speed Bar for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
